019package org.jgrapes.util;
020
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.lang.ref.WeakReference;
024import java.nio.file.FileSystem;
025import java.nio.file.Files;
026import java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException;
027import java.nio.file.Path;
028import static java.nio.file.StandardWatchEventKinds.*;
029import java.nio.file.WatchKey;
030import java.nio.file.WatchService;
031import java.time.Instant;
032import java.util.ArrayList;
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
038import java.util.logging.Level;
039import java.util.logging.Logger;
040import java.util.stream.Collectors;
041import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
043import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
044import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
045import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
046import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
047import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged;
048import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
049
050/**
051 * A component that watches paths in the file system for changes
052 * and sends events if such changes occur. 
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
055public class FileSystemWatcher extends Component {
056
057    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
058    protected static final Logger logger
059        = Logger.getLogger(FileSystemWatcher.class.getName());
060
061    private final WatcherRegistry watcherRegistry = new WatcherRegistry();
062    private final Map<Path, DirectorySubscription> subscriptions
063        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
064
065    /**
066     * Creates a new component base with its channel set to
067     * itself.
068     */
069    public FileSystemWatcher() {
070        super();
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Creates a new component base with its channel set to the given 
075     * channel. As a special case {@link Channel#SELF} can be
076     * passed to the constructor to make the component use itself
077     * as channel. The special value is necessary as you 
078     * obviously cannot pass an object to be constructed to its 
079     * constructor.
080     *
081     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's
082     * handlers listen on by default and that 
083     * {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)} sends the event to
084     */
085    public FileSystemWatcher(Channel componentChannel) {
086        super(componentChannel);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Register a path to wath. Subsequent {@link FileChanged} 
091     * events will be fire on the channel(s) on which the
092     * {@link WatchFile} event was fired.
093     * 
094     * The channel is stored using a weak reference, so no explicit
095     * "clear watch" is required.
096     *
097     * @param event the event
098     * @param channel the channel
099     * @throws IOException if an I/O exception occurs
100     */
101    @Handler
102    public void onWatchFile(WatchFile event, Channel channel)
103            throws IOException {
104        final Path path = event.path().toAbsolutePath();
105        synchronized (subscriptions) {
106            addSubscription(path, channel);
107        }
108    }
109
110    private Subscription addSubscription(Path watched, Channel channel) {
111        var subs = new Subscription(watched, channel);
112        try {
113            // Using computeIfAbsent causes recursive update
114            var watcher = subscriptions.get(watched.getParent());
115            if (watcher == null) {
116                watcher = watcherRegistry.register(watched.getParent());
117            }
118            watcher.add(subs);
119            if (Files.exists(watched)) {
120                Path real = watched.toRealPath();
121                if (!real.equals(watched)) {
122                    addSubscription(real, channel).linkedFrom(subs);
123                }
124            }
125        } catch (IOException e) {
126            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
127                () -> "Cannot watch: " + e.getMessage());
128        }
129        return subs;
130    }
131
132    private void handleWatchEvent(Path directory) {
133        Optional.ofNullable(subscriptions.get(directory))
134            .ifPresent(DirectorySubscription::directoryChanged);
135    }
136
137    /**
138     * The Class WatcherRegistry.
139     */
140    private final class WatcherRegistry {
141        private final Map<FileSystem, Watcher> watchers
142            = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
143
144        private Watcher watcher(Path path) {
145            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CloseResource")
146            Watcher watcher = watchers.get(path.getFileSystem());
147            if (watcher == null) {
148                try {
149                    watcher = new Watcher(path.getFileSystem());
150                    watchers.put(path.getFileSystem(), watcher);
151                } catch (IOException e) {
152                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
153                        () -> "Cannot get watch service: " + e.getMessage());
154                    return null;
155                }
156            }
157            return watcher;
158        }
159
160        /**
161         * Register.
162         *
163         * @param toWatch the to watch
164         * @return the directory subscription
165         */
166        public DirectorySubscription register(Path toWatch) {
167            Watcher watcher = watcher(toWatch);
168            if (watcher == null) {
169                return null;
170            }
171            try {
172                var watcherRef = new DirectorySubscription(
173                    toWatch.register(watcher.watchService,
174                        ENTRY_CREATE, ENTRY_DELETE, ENTRY_MODIFY));
175                subscriptions.put(toWatch, watcherRef);
176                return watcherRef;
177            } catch (IOException e) {
178                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
179                    () -> "Cannot watch: " + e.getMessage());
180            }
181            return null;
182        }
183
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * The Class Watcher.
188     */
189    private final class Watcher {
190        private final WatchService watchService;
191
192        private Watcher(FileSystem fileSystem) throws IOException {
193            watchService = fileSystem.newWatchService();
194            var roots = StreamSupport
195                .stream(fileSystem.getRootDirectories().spliterator(), false)
196                .map(Path::toString)
197                .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator));
198            Thread.ofVirtual().name(roots + " watcher")
199                .start(() -> {
200                    while (true) {
201                        try {
202                            WatchKey key = watchService.take();
203                            // Events have to be consumed
204                            key.pollEvents();
205                            if (!(key.watchable() instanceof Path)) {
206                                key.reset();
207                                continue;
208                            }
209                            handleWatchEvent((Path) key.watchable());
210                            key.reset();
211                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
212                            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
213                                () -> "No WatchKey: " + e.getMessage());
214                        }
215                    }
216                });
217        }
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * The Class DirectorySubscription.
222     */
223    private class DirectorySubscription {
224        private final WatchKey watchKey;
225        private final List<Subscription> watched;
226
227        /**
228         * Instantiates a new directory watcher.
229         *
230         * @param watchKey the watch key
231         */
232        public DirectorySubscription(WatchKey watchKey) {
233            this.watchKey = watchKey;
234            watched = Collections.synchronizedList(new ArrayList<>());
235        }
236
237        /**
238         * Adds the subscription.
239         *
240         * @param subs the subs
241         */
242        public void add(Subscription subs) {
243            watched.add(subs);
244        }
245
246        /**
247         * Removes the subscription.
248         *
249         * @param subs the subs
250         */
251        public void remove(Subscription subs) {
252            watched.remove(subs);
253            if (watched.isEmpty()) {
254                subscriptions.remove(subs.directory());
255                watchKey.cancel();
256            }
257
258        }
259
260        /**
261         * Directory changed.
262         */
263        public void directoryChanged() {
264            // Prevent concurrent modification exception
265            List.copyOf(watched).forEach(Subscription::handleChange);
266        }
267    }
268
269    /**
270     * The Class Registree.
271     */
272    private class Subscription {
273        private WeakReference<Channel> notifyOn;
274        private final Path path;
275        private Subscription linkedFrom;
276        private Subscription linksTo;
277        private Instant lastModified;
278
279        /**
280         * Instantiates a new subscription.
281         *
282         * @param path the path
283         * @param notifyOn the notify on
284         */
285        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseVarargs")
286        public Subscription(Path path, Channel notifyOn) {
287            this.notifyOn = new WeakReference<>(notifyOn);
288            this.path = path;
289            updateLastModified();
290        }
291
292        /**
293         * Return the directoy of this subscription's path.
294         *
295         * @return the path
296         */
297        public Path directory() {
298            return path.getParent();
299        }
300
301        /**
302         * Linked from.
303         *
304         * @param symLinkSubs the sym link subs
305         * @return the subscription
306         */
307        public Subscription linkedFrom(Subscription symLinkSubs) {
308            linkedFrom = symLinkSubs;
309            symLinkSubs.linksTo = this;
310            notifyOn = null;
311            return this;
312        }
313
314        /**
315         * Removes the subscription.
316         */
317        public void remove() {
318            synchronized (subscriptions) {
319                if (linksTo != null) {
320                    linksTo.remove();
321                }
322                var directory = path.getParent();
323                var watchInfo = subscriptions.get(directory);
324                if (watchInfo == null) {
325                    // Shouldn't happen, but...
326                    return;
327                }
328                watchInfo.remove(this);
329            }
330        }
331
332        private void updateLastModified() {
333            try {
334                if (!Files.exists(path)) {
335                    lastModified = null;
336                    return;
337                }
338                lastModified = Files.getLastModifiedTime(path).toInstant();
339            } catch (NoSuchFileException e) {
340                // There's a race condition here.
341                lastModified = null;
342            } catch (IOException e) {
343                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
344                    () -> "Cannot get modified time: " + e.getMessage());
345            }
346        }
347
348        /**
349         * Handle change.
350         */
351        private void handleChange() {
352            Subscription watched = Optional.ofNullable(linkedFrom).orElse(this);
353
354            // Check if channel is still valid
355            Channel channel = watched.notifyOn.get();
356            if (channel == null) {
357                watched.remove();
358                return;
359            }
360
361            // Evaluate change from the perspective of "watched"
362            Instant prevModified = watched.lastModified;
363            watched.updateLastModified();
364            if (prevModified == null) {
365                // Check if created
366                if (watched.lastModified != null) {
367                    // Yes, created.
368                    fire(new FileChanged(watched.path,
369                        FileChanged.Kind.CREATED), channel);
370                    checkLink(watched, channel);
371                }
372                return;
373            }
374
375            // File has existed (prevModified != null)
376            if (watched.lastModified == null) {
377                // ... but is now deleted
378                if (watched.linksTo != null) {
379                    watched.linksTo.remove();
380                }
381                fire(new FileChanged(watched.path, FileChanged.Kind.DELETED),
382                    channel);
383                return;
384            }
385
386            // Check if modified
387            if (!prevModified.equals(watched.lastModified)) {
388                fire(new FileChanged(watched.path, FileChanged.Kind.MODIFIED),
389                    channel);
390                checkLink(watched, channel);
391            }
392        }
393
394        private void checkLink(Subscription watched, Channel channel) {
395            try {
396                Path curTarget = watched.path.toRealPath();
397                if (!curTarget.equals(watched.path)) {
398                    // watched is symbolic link
399                    if (watched.linksTo == null) {
400                        addSubscription(curTarget, channel).linkedFrom(watched);
401                        return;
402                    }
403                    if (!watched.linksTo.path.equals(curTarget)) {
404                        // Link target has changed
405                        watched.linksTo.remove();
406                        addSubscription(curTarget, channel).linkedFrom(watched);
407                    }
408
409                }
410            } catch (IOException e) { // NOPMD
411                // Race condition, target deleted?
412            }
413        }
414    }
415}
